Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a problem where two people need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can illustrate a string telephone that uses sound to communicate.
The student can demonstrate the use of provided materials in their design.
The student can label the drawing to show which parts send and receive sound.
The student can highlight how the string telephone helps people communicate over distances.
The student can use arrows or symbols to show sound movement through the string.
